DOC.brief_summary: To investigate efficacy laser photocoagulation combine ranibizumab intravitreal injection macular edema ( ME ) secondary branch retinal vein occlusion ( BRVO ) long term .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Intravitreal Ranibizumab With Without Macular Laser Photocoagulation ME Secondary BRVO
DOC.detailed_description: To investigate efficacy ranibizumab intravitreal injections-driven achieve vision acuity stabilization compare combination laser photocoagulation Chinese patient visual impairment ME due BRVO . The result trial use support new therapy BRVO China .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Written inform consent 2 . Male female Chinese patient ≥ 18 year age BRVO 3 . Visual impairment due ME secondary BRVO least one eye BCVA score 73 24 least 24 letter eye 1 . Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman woman childbearing potential without use effective contraception 2 . Stroke myocardial infarction le 3 month prior screen visit 3 . Renal failure creatinine level > 2.0 mg/dl 4 . Uncontrolled hypertension 5 . Active ocular infection intraocular inflammation eye 6 . Neovascularization iris neovascular glaucoma eye 7 . History uveitis vitreomacular traction eye 8 . Treatment antiangiogenic drug within 3 month prior baseline visit eye 9 . Glaucoma intraocular pressure ( IOP ) ≥ 24 mmHg study eye 10 . Active proliferative diabetic retinopathy study eye 11 . Use investigational drug within 30 day systemic vascular endothecial growth factor ( VEGF ) antagonism drug within 6 month prior baseline visit 12 . Prior laser photocoagulation intraocular procedure within 3 month prior baseline study eye 13 . History intravitreal corticosteroid treatment phakic study eye , aphakic pseudophakic within 3 month prior screen 14 . History vitrectomy study eye 15 . Other protocol define inclusion /exclusion criterion may apply
